title: Classic Roasted Chicken and Potatoes
steps: Peel and cube the potatoes, and slice the onions into wedges.
Toss the chicken, potatoes, and onions in a baking dish with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Spread the ingredients in a single layer to ensure even cooking.
Roast for 45 minutes or until the chicken is golden and the potatoes are tender.
funFact: Roasting chicken and root vegetables together in a single pot became a staple of European peasant cooking because it conserved fuel. The potatoes were traditionally placed underneath the meat to soak up the flavorful drippings.
